highlights: Developed and maintained clean, functional, and sustainable web applications by writing and defining clean code.
Collaborated on large-scale projects with multiple developers using agile methodology.
Supported project managers in comprehending client requirements and devising technical solutions.
Generated technical documentation and facilitated knowledge sharing within the development team.
Collaborated with team members to identify and resolve software bugs.
Conducted troubleshooting and debugging of software to address discrepancies.
Continuously enhanced coding skills and codebase knowledge through regular training, mentorship, and consistent practice.
Shadowed senior software developers during projects to acquire proficiency in coding and bug resolution.
